snippet: Prosecutors said they would concentrate on large, for-profit operations that use the medical law as a cover for large-scale drug operations, with marijuana being sent across state lines.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors said they would concentrate on large, for-profit operations that use the medical law as a cover for large-scale drug operations, with marijuana being sent across state lines.

headline.main: U.S. Attorneys in California Set Crackdown on Marijuana
headline.print_headline: U.S. Attorneys In California Set Crackdown On Marijuana
headline.seo: Calif. to Crack Down on Large, For-Profit Medical Marijuana Outfits
